name: Orange Is the New Yellow
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Eric Horsted
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Marge lets Bart go to the park alone because he's too irritating, then she ends up getting arrested for leaving him unsupervised.
